message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!  I think you'll find it's in your best interest to accept this offer.
I can still get a bigger share, 55-45 is reasonable!
This is my final offer. Inflation is hurting both of us, but I'm willing to split it 60/40 again. Let's end this game.
